name: Orc
currHomes: Shadow Marches, Demon Wastes, and Ironroot Mountains
summary: The orcs and half-orcs of the Shadow Marches are the first who learned druidic magic and sealed away the evil daelkyr
The orcs and half-orcs of the Ghaash’kala tribe on the outskirts of the Demon Wastes are servants of the Silver Flame and battle the fiends of Khyber.
The Jhorash’tar orcs that were driven into the Ironroot Mountains by ancient dwarves are fierce and bear resentment towards the dwarves.
characteristics: The orcs of Eberron are hardy, muscular, and passionate people.
Both of the orcs and half-orcs are seen as the guardians of Khorvaire, as they either keep aberrations or fiends at bay.
prompts: What brought you out of the Shadow Marches or Demon Wastes?
Do you seek to battle an aberrations or fiends like your ancestors?
Did you leave the Jhorash’tar savages behind to live a more civilized life?
